com.epimorphics.lda.restlets

Class RouterRestlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.restlets.RouterRestlet

  • public class RouterRestlet
extends Object
    Handles all incoming API calls and routes to appropriate locations.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds

    • Constructor Detail

      • RouterRestlet

        public RouterRestlet(@Context
             javax.servlet.ServletContext con)
        Initialise this RouterRestlet. Happens a lot, so expensive initialisations should be cached. Sets the router used by this instance according to the appropriate LDA configs.
